seo.title: Printz Enterprise: Gestione del Marchio e Piattaforma di Stampa B2B
seo.description: Soluzione digitale per il flusso di lavoro di stampa aziendale. Standardizzare le linee guida del marchio, costi trasparenti, approvazione automatizzata e gestione fattura IVA 100%.
seo.keywords: Gestione del marchio, Stampa aziendale, Web-to-Print B2B, Stampa aziendale, Linee guida del marchio, Flusso di approvazione, Piattaforma di stampa digitale

hero.description: Digital platform for enterprise printing workflow. Standardize Brand Guidelines, transparent bidding, and automated approval workflow.

valueProposition.quote: In B2B, the lowest price is less important than

solutions.sectionDesc: 3 core modules that make Printz the right hand of Procurement & Marketing departments.

brandVault.title: Brand Vault™
brandVault.subtitle: Brand Safe
brandVault.desc: Lock down Brand Assets. Employees can only change text content on existing templates. Completely eliminate risks of wrong colors, fonts, or distorted logos.

autoPilot.title: Auto-Pilot
autoPilot.subtitle: Automated Operations
autoPilot.desc: Built-in multi-level approval workflow. From employee order to manager approval takes only 30 seconds. No back-and-forth emails, no manual quotes.

smartCost.title: Smart Cost
smartCost.subtitle: Cost Transparency
smartCost.desc: Blind bidding system ensures best market prices. Automatically consolidate payables and issue a single VAT invoice at month-end.

aiUsp.description: Automated file pre-flight checks, resolution warnings, and bleed optimization. Ensures 100% match between physical print and digital design.
aiUsp.feature3: Optimize paper size to save 30% costs
